Description_lang: Heals your pet for $<total>% of its total health over $d.$?s343242[Each time Mend Pet heals your pet, it has a $343242s2% chance to dispel a harmful magic effect from your pet.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Heals $w1% of the pet's health every $t1 sec.$?s343242[Each time Mend Pet heals your pet, you have a $343242s2% chance to dispel a harmful magic effect from your pet.][]

description_blz.en_US: Heals your pet for 50% of its total health over 10 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Sana un 50% de la salud total de tu mascota durante 10 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cura 50% do máximo de pontos de vida do seu ajudante ao longo de 10 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Heilt Euren Begleiter im Verlauf von 10 Sek. um 50% seiner gesamten Gesundheit.
description_blz.en_GB: Heals your pet for 50% of its total health over 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Sana a tu mascota un 50% de su salud total durante 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Rend à votre familier 50% de son total de points de vie en 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Cura il tuo famiglio del 50% della sua salute massima in 10 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Восполняет вашему питомцу 50% от его общего запаса здоровья в течение 10 сек.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在10秒內為寵物治療其總生命力的50%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在10秒内为你的宠物恢复50%的最大生命值。
